plot: Rather than a plot, Ugoku develops an undiluted visual and sonic drama instead. Pounding rhythms and over a thousand elaborately altered and hand-colored clips rise to crescendo after crescendo in a Himalayan range of peak experiences.
title: Ugoku
plot_es: Rather than a plot, Ugoku develops an undiluted visual and sonic drama instead. Pounding rhythms and over a thousand elaborately altered and hand-colored clips rise to crescendo after crescendo in a Himalayan range of peak experiences.
plot_en: Rather than a plot, Ugoku develops an undiluted visual and sonic drama instead. Pounding rhythms and over a thousand elaborately altered and hand-colored clips rise to crescendo after crescendo in a Himalayan range of peak experiences.
